title: Chocolate Chia Pudding
directions: Working in two batches (if using the cup that comes with your immersion blender; you may also be able to use a high powered blender), blend up the ingredients until most chia seeds are broken down. It should become thick and creamy.
Portion out into jars and top with fruit of choice.
ingredients: 1/4 cup maple syrup (honey or low carb sweetener may be subbed)
